int table_data_add_row (  table_data *    table,
table_row *    row
) 
 

Adds a row of data to a given table (in proper lexographical order).

returns SNMPERR_SUCCESS on successful addition. or SNMPERR_GENERR on failure (E.G., indexes already existed)

Referenced by config_parse_add_row(), and table_dataset_add_row().

00037     table_row *nextrow, *prevrow;

00040         table_data_generate_index_oid(row);
00041 
00042     /* we don't store the index info as it
00043        takes up memory. */
00044     snmp_free_varbind(row->indexes);
00045     row->indexes = NULL;
00046 
00047     if (!row->index_oid) {
00048         snmp_log(LOG_ERR, "illegal data attempted to be added to table %s\n",
00049                  table->name);
00050         return SNMPERR_GENERR;
00051     }
00052 
00053     /* insert it into the table in the proper oid-lexographical order */
00054     for(nextrow = table->first_row, prevrow = NULL;
00055         nextrow != NULL;
00056         prevrow = nextrow, nextrow = nextrow->next) {
00057         if (snmp_oid_compare(nextrow->index_oid, nextrow->index_oid_len,
00058                              row->index_oid, row->index_oid_len) > 0)
00059             break;
00060         if (snmp_oid_compare(nextrow->index_oid, nextrow->index_oid_len,
00061                              row->index_oid, row->index_oid_len) == 0) {
00062             /* exact match.  Duplicate entries illegal */
00063             snmp_log(LOG_WARNING,
00064                      "duplicate table data attempted to be entered\n");
00065             return SNMPERR_GENERR;
00066         }
00067     }
00068 
00069 
00070     /* ok, we have the location of where it should go */
00071     /* (after prevrow, and before nextrow) */
00072     row->next = nextrow;
00073     row->prev = prevrow;
00074     
00075     if (row->next)
00076         row->next->prev = row;
00077 
00078     if (row->prev)
00079         row->prev->next = row;
00080 
00081     if (NULL == row->prev)       /* it's the (new) first row */
00082         table->first_row = row;
00083     
00084     DEBUGMSGTL(("table_data_add_data", "added something...\n"));
00085 
00086     return SNMPERR_SUCCESS;
